titleStmt.title: A pleasant purge for a Roman Catholike to evacuate his evill humours consisting of a century of polemicall epigrams, wherein divers grosse errors and corruptions of the Church of Rome are discovered, censured, refuted, in a facetious yet serious manner / by William Prynne ...
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R.C. for Michael Sparke, Senior ...,
